# proximityState

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the proximity sensor is close to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var proximityState: Bool { get }
```

## Using the proximity sensor

- **isProximityMonitoringEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether proximity monitoring is enabled.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether proximity monitoring is enabled.
items.name: isProximityMonitoringEnabled
